faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our jewelry, services, and policies.

quality.question: What is the quality of your gold jewelry?
quality.answer: All our jewelry is crafted with authentic 18k and 14k gold. Each piece comes with a certificate of authenticity and is hallmarked for your assurance.

shipping.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the US. Express shipping (1-2 days) and international shipping options are also available. All orders are fully insured and tracked.

sizing.question: How do I determine the right ring size?
sizing.answer: We provide a complimentary ring sizing kit upon request. You can also visit our size guide or contact our customer service for personalized assistance.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original condition. Custom pieces may have different return terms. All returns are processed with full refund.

maintenance.question: How should I care for my gold jewelry?
maintenance.answer: Store pieces separately, clean with mild soap and soft cloth, avoid harsh chemicals, and bring for professional cleaning annually. We offer complimentary maintenance services.

customization.question: Do you offer custom jewelry design?
customization.answer: Yes! Our master craftsmen can create bespoke pieces tailored to your specifications. Contact us to discuss your vision and receive a personalized quote.
